page.title: 15PAUL'S SUNDAY IN KNOTTINGLEY
page.content:
A Typical Sunday:I like to get out of my bed at 7 in the morning to watch {television}until 9 o'clock.Then I'm on my{bike}and then I'm bored,so I go to call for Andrew.We play{football}and after an hour I get bored again.We go to my house and play on the{organ}for ten minutes.Then we play with{Bolt and {Build};we build a train.Then we go out and play with our{catapults}and fire stones in the quarry to hit the old deck chair.Then we pass the{rugby}ball to see who can catch it the most.Then I put the rugby ball away and we run up to Andrew's to ask his dad if he will let us go{fishing}with him down Nina's(quarry).He lets us go with him and we try to catch some baby{frogs}.} We do not find any,so we go home.
_Paul,age 9
